mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTORDER( ORDERSEQ, PRODUCTSEQ, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTPRICE, QUANTITY, ORDERAMOUNT, PAYMETHOD, USERSEQ, USERID, RECEIVENAME, RECEIVERPHONE, RECEIVEROADDRESS, RECEIVERRADDRESS, RECEIVERDETAILADDRESS, ORDERDATE) VALUES(ORDERSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productSeq, jdbcType=NUMBER}, #{productName, jdbcType=VARCHAR2}, #{productPrice, jdbcType=NUMBER}, #{quantity, jdbcType=NUMBER}, #{orderAmount, jdbcType=NUMBER}, #{paymethod, jdbcType=NUMBER}, #{userSeq, jdbcType=NUMBER}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR2}, #{receiveName, jdbcType=VARCHAR2}, #{receiverPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR2}, #{receiverOaddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR2}, #{receiverRaddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR2}, #{receiverDetailaddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR2}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT userSeq, orderSeq, receiveName, receiverPhone, receiverOaddress, receiverRaddress, receiverDetailaddress, orderdate, ROWNUM FROM (SELECT userSeq, orderSeq, receiveName, receiverPhone, receiverOaddress, receiverRaddress, receiverDetailaddress, orderdate, ROWNUM FROM productorder WHERE orderseq = #{orderseq} ORDER BY orderdate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
